description.content: One of London’s most iconic hotels, The Royal Horseguards features over 280 bedrooms and suites with stunning views over the River Thames. Walking distance from Charing Cross, Westminster & Embankment stations. The hotel is only 43 minutes from Heathrow. Perfectly located close to Westminster, the London Eye & Trafalgar Square. After a busy day enjoy dinner at One Twenty One Two Restaurant or a drink at the Equus Bar. In the summer, the outdoor terrace can be booked for private events. This impressive building is also home to 16 meeting rooms including One Whitehall Place, which is one of the most unique banquet and conference venues in West London. TripAdvisor Traveller’s Choice 2024 & Greenage ECOSmart 2023 Gold Accreditation. We are excited to announce improvements to our restaurant and the Terrace from September 16th to 22nd 2024. During this time, we will offer our full room service menu and limited all-day dining options from the Whitehall Suite. Our friendly team will be available to assist you with dining at the hotel. All other facilities will operate as usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by our renovation work during your stay.
